title: Ragnarok Royale [Free to play MMORPG]
description:
--Introduction--

Ragnarok Royale is a completely free gameserver and is based on the populair Korean MMORPG Ragnarok Online. It has gone for a fresh new start on Februari the 27th, after running more than 3 years! If you wish to to be part of a great community from the beginning, this will be your chance! You can register an account at www.ragnarok-royale.net for free. Be quick, as there&#039;s currently a >> free 100 kafra points give-away << at registration! This client is fully updated and contains the Royale Lite client in combination with the latest Korean Sakray client.

--Features--

Here is a short list of what Ragnarok Royale has to offer you. To get a better impression you might want to check out some of the screenshots that can be found at our website.

+ Using AEGIS technology
The official software, which means stability and very few bugs! Most servers out there use so-called emulators, which are trying to imitate exactly what our software is already doing.

+ Lowrates 7x/7x/3x
These rates provide a long-term playability and balance. Altough leveling may seem slow at first, most people will prefer it after they obtained a character that really feels as theirs.

+ Earn free Kafra Points, no donation needed!
No need to spend your money to buy those rare shop-only items, you can earn by simply voting every day and by participating in events such as loading screen contests and fanart.

+ Up to Episode 11.3: Nameless Island
Including monsters such as Beelzebub and Ragged Zombie. As an extra we also have the new Moscovia maps and mobs!

+ Official Quests
We have most of the official quests available, which include the well-known The Sign, Kiel Hyre and all of the general town quests up to the city of Rachel. All quests for the Veins region will soon be implemented.

+ Including a Cloth Dyeing NPC
There&#039;s no need to look exactly the same as other players, you can pick a dye that suits you and create your own trademark!

If you have any questions, or troubles you can try your question at the forum, or check the FAQ.

Website: http://www.ragnarok-royale.net
Forum: http://www.ragnarok-royale.net/forum
